title: Which is the best musical keyboard for the entry level, the Roland E-X20 or the Roland GO:KEYS 61K? - Quora

response.answer_text: Greetings of the day, No matter, whether you are a beginner or a pro, Roland E-X20 offers a great playability. That’s said, it also produces high quality sound. If the worry of inferior tone worries you a lot, go for Roland E-X20 without giving a second thought.  If you are the kind of on-the-go musician, go with Roland Go: Keys 61K as it is lightweight and offers a great portability along with powerful features and functionalities.  You can find more information on both the keyboards on DevMusical’s official website. You can even buy any of them with DevMusical. It is an online music store that has been dealing in musical instruments since a considerable amount of time and have a well established reputation. I hope that was helpful.
